alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:04AM CDT until June 17 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lancaster County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 104 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Malcolm, or 10 miles northwest of Lincoln, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lincoln Airport around 110 AM CDT. Pioneers Park around 115 AM CDT. Lincoln and Holmes Lake Park around 120 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Walton and Bennet. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 390 and 414. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
